publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-189 Ross Finnie: The Draft Welfare of Farmed Animals (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2003—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee, in consideration of the draft Welfare of Farmed Animals (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2003, recommends that the regulations be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*

S2M-189 Ross Finnie: The Draft Welfare of Farmed Animals (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2003—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee , in consideration of the draft Welfare of Farmed Animals (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2003, recommends that the regulations be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson
